interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 10Pcs 3D Face Inner Silicone Bracket for Comfortable Breathing, Washable Reusable Silicone Bracket Under Frame Lipstick Protector Keep Fabric off Mouth to Create More Breathing Space
Review Date: 2020/12/09
Store: Blaikepcam
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 6.18 x 3.43 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: These silicon brackets were the best product I ever purchased. It has made breathing so much easy while wearing masks. I normally wear glasses so whenever I wear a mask it always fogs with my glasses esp when it's cold outside. After putting these on I am finally able to breathe and not worry about the way the fabric touches my face when I am walking outside and no fogs in my glasses. The brackets were lightweight and comfortable to wear,great buy in these difficult times.
Review Title: Great design!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Comfort & Functionality:** The user prioritizes products that enhance comfort during daily activities, particularly when wearing masks. They value solutions that alleviate common issues, such as fogging glasses and uncomfortable fabric contact.

- **Practical Solutions:** Emphasis on practical designs that facilitate easier breathing and usability, showing a preference for items that address specific challenges faced during the pandemic.

- **Positive Experience:** The user expresses satisfaction with products that deliver tangible benefits, rating high for those that improve their experience in constraining situations.

- **Lightweight & Wearable:** Preference for items that are lightweight and comfortable, indicating a desire for unobtrusive solutions that do not hinder normal activities.

- **Adaptability:** Seek products that are effective in various environmental conditions, such as cold weather, demonstrating a need for versatility.

Overall, the user values innovation that improves their quality of life during challenging times while ensuring comfort and practicality.
